options.description: The options for the jar agent, separated by spaces.

inst.description: The Instrumentation instance to which the agent will be attached.

question: 我可以判斷符號“getVersion”是否可讀取於當前物件所關聯的原生函式介面程式庫嗎？

function.name: NFILibrary.isMemberReadable
function.description: Checks if the specified symbol is readable in the native function interface library associated with the current object.

symbol.description: The symbol to check for readability.

recursive.description: The InteropLibrary instance used for recursive checks (automatically provided by the runtime). Default null

question: 如何使用特定的節點庫`NodeLibraryInstance`，使用接收器`ExportInlinedObject1Instance`，對內聯對象執行通用操作，並使用參數'HelloWorld'和專用節點`InlinableNodeInstance`？

function.name: ExportNodeTest.doGeneric
function.description: Executes a generic operation on the given receiver object with the provided argument, using a specialized inlinable node and bound to a node library.

receiver.description: The receiver object on which the operation is performed.

argument.description: The argument to pass to the node's execute method.

node.description: The specialized inlinable node used for execution.

library.description: The node library to which this operation is bound.

question: 如何在Truffle DSL處理器中為呼叫轉換生成一個CodeTree，使用名為'convertValue'的非靜態方法，該方法需要一個名為'frameVar'的框架參數和一個以'returnValueCode'表示的返回值？

function.name: InstrumentableProcessor.createCallConverter
function.description: Generates a CodeTree that represents a call to a converter method, handling both static and instance methods, and accommodating for different numbers of parameters.

converterMethod.description: The ExecutableElement representing the converter method.

frameParameterName.description: The name of the frame parameter to be used in the call.

returnName.description: The CodeTree representing the name of the return value.

question: 如何為代表Truffle DSL處理器中的節點的`NodeClass`類生成內省信息，並指定該內省不會被內聯？

function.name: FlatNodeGenFactory.generateIntrospectionInfo
function.description: Generates introspection information for a given class representing a node in the Truffle DSL processor.

clazz.description: The class element representing the node for which introspection information is to be generated.

inlined.description: Indicates whether the introspection is inlined.

question: 如果迴圈條件已經被評估為真150次和假50次，那麼它成為真的機率是多少？

function.name: LoopConditionProfile.calculateProbability
function.description: Calculates the probability of a loop condition being true based on the counts of true and false evaluations.

trueCountLocal.description: The count of times the loop condition has been evaluated to true.

falseCountLocal.description: The count of times the loop condition has been evaluated to false.

question: 如何使用工廠物件`myFactory`和一個無法採用的現有委派實例`existingDelegate`來為自定義程式庫類型`MyCustomLibrary`創建委派程式庫實例？

function.name: LibraryExport.createDelegate
function.description: Creates a delegate library instance using the provided factory and delegate. If the delegate is not adoptable, it forces adoption to ensure proper parent pointer implementation.

factory.description: The factory used to create a new delegate instance of the library.

delegate.description: The existing delegate instance of the library.
